pullRequest.body:
Line derivative of a quadratic form is given by its polar bilinear form.

---

GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

### PR summary [274c8d1295](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/14450/commits/274c8d1295230e29f2dea04b71ce93586ee86b4b)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
| `Mathlib.Analysis.Calculus.LineDeriv.QuadraticMap`|1466|

</details>

---

#### Declarations diff

`+ hasLineDerivAt`
`+ lineDeriv`
`+ lineDifferentiableAt`
`+ map_add`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

:v: urkud can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).
OK, I'll wait.

#7569 is now in. #14215 (the one which adds the same `add` lemma you have here) is also now dependency-free, but I'm happy for this to go in first if you get around to resolving conflicts here before reviewing there.
@eric-wieser I resolved conflicts and generalized to `QuadraticMap`.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9925000716/job/27416930974)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9925000716/job/27416931180)
bors merge
Already running a review

bors merge

Thanks!

bors d+

LGTM, though I'd prefer to wait for #7569 to land first so that it doesn't pick up any more conflicts. Maybe this will hold more generally after that too.

bors merge

Thanks!
This is in #14215 with a different name
Do you want me to rename it to `map_add`?
Yes please; and mark it `protected`
(or wait for #14215, which should only have one dependency left shortly...)
I renamed for now.

```suggestion
protected theorem lineDeriv_eq (f : QuadraticForm 𝕜 E) : lineDeriv 𝕜 f = polar f := by
```

While I agree that this is a better naming scheme, existing lemmas like [ContinuousLinearMap.fderiv](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Analysis/Calculus/FDeriv/Linear.html#ContinuousLinearMap.fderiv) use the naming scheme I used in the PR. We should consider renaming all these lemmas at once, but I would prefer to postpone it to another PR.
Fair.

```suggestion
protected theorem map_add (f : M → R) (x y : M) :
```

```suggestion
  simpa [HasLineDerivAt, QuadraticForm.map_add, f.map_smul, mul_assoc]
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(LineDeriv/QuadraticMap): new file
